name: Shirataki Cashew Pesto
description: Indulge in the guilt-free pleasure of our Shirataki Cashew Pesto, a perfect blend for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. This healthified recipe brings together the creamy softness of cream cheese fluff with the nutty crunch of cashews, all mixed into shirataki noodles for a deliciously healthy meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Soak cashews in hot water for 20 minutes, then drain.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse shirataki noodles under cold water for 2 minutes then boil for 3 minutes. Drain and set aside to dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, combine the cream cheese fluff, unsweetened vanilla almond milk, pesto sauce, and soaked cashews. Blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the shirataki noodles with the cashew pesto mixture until evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
